marketplaces.name: remi-engineering
marketplaces.description: Plugins and utilities maintained by REMI-Agents for Claude Code.

files.README.md:
# remi-engineering-marketplace

## Experimental

This repository is **experimental** and may change frequently.

## Purpose

This is a shared repository for the prompt engineering team to build, test, and maintain plugins for coding agents.

## Structure

- `plugins/`: Plugin definitions and command content.
- `.claude-plugin/`: Claude plugin configuration assets.

## Notes

Use this repository for collaboration and iteration on plugin ideas before any production hardening process.

plugins.name: helloremi
plugins.description: Minimal hello-world plugin for marketplace install + command smoke tests

plugins.name: remi-wiggum
plugins.description: Scaffold and run a Ralph/Wiggum-style iterative loop using a .wiggum/ folder
